"...I see. So that's how this is...": "No, but if it's... Ah, I see. So in that case..."
"What are you doing?"
"Studying something?"
"Hyah?!"
"Ah. It's... you, <%me>. Right. You scared me."
"Nyahh?!"
"Uh, y-yes. Studying."
"...That's the second time this has happened."

"If you were an enemy, I would have known you were there immediately.
Have you been training to be able to erase your presence?"
"...Well, no matter."

"I was just studying up on the Vanford Laboratory.
Out of personal curiosity, that is."
"The name \"Vanford\" seems to have its origins with Crawford's grandfather."

"Before this laboratory came to ruin, he seems to have made
numerous breakthroughs and vital contributions to ARKS engineering."
"It seems this laboratory was named in honor of those achievements."

"It seems that he is to thank for much of our progress against
the DOLLS, and how Central City has become what it is today."

"But then one day, by way of a massive DOLLS offensive...
It was all destroyed."

"Rather than try to preserve the facility, it seems that Vanford
fought on the front lines so his colleagues could escape."
"Ultimately leading to the loss of his own life."
"What an outstanding person..."
"On Halpha, people like that seem to live the shortest lives..."
"Really, this place is..."

"What transpired here likely has to why Crawford so singularly
focuses on building up our defenses rather than offenses."

"Out of fear of losing something again.
Losing people again."
"That is likely the correct course of action."

"It is thanks to him that the people of Central City
can life the peaceful lives that they do."
"I too would like to aid in that endeavor."
"I feel the same way."
"Then we'll have to become even stronger."
"Indeed. I thought you'd say as much."
"Indeed, we most certainly will."
"Lets give it our all, shall we?"
